
```{r readdata}
coefs22_1 <- read.table('coefs22_hybrid1.txt')
coefs22_2 <- read.table('coefs22_hybrid2.txt')
coefs36_1 <- read.table('coefs36_hybrid1.txt')
coefs36_2 <- read.table('coefs36_hybrid2.txt')
coefs38_1 <- read.table('coefs38_hybrid1.txt')
coefs38_2 <- read.table('coefs38_hybrid2.txt')
coefs40_1 <- read.table('coefs40_hybrid1.txt')
coefs40_2 <- read.table('coefs40_hybrid2.txt')

## convergence 1 to everybody
c(table(coefs22_1$V10), 
  table(coefs22_2$V10), 
  table(coefs36_1$V12), 
  table(coefs36_2$V12), 
  table(coefs38_1$V10), 
  table(coefs38_2$V10), 
  table(coefs40_1$V10), 
  table(coefs40_2$V10))

coefs22 <- tibble(bind_rows(coefs22_1, coefs22_2))%>%
    select(-V1, -V10)%>%
    mutate(V10=rep(1:2, each=5))

coefs36 <- tibble(bind_rows(coefs36_1, coefs36_2))%>%
    select(-V1, -V12)%>%
    mutate(V12=rep(1:2, each=5))

coefs38 <- tibble(bind_rows(coefs38_1, coefs38_2))%>%
    select(-V1, -V10)%>%
    mutate(V10=rep(1:2, each=5))

coefs40 <- tibble(bind_rows(coefs40_1, coefs40_2))%>%
    select(-V1, -V10)%>%
    mutate(V10=rep(1:2, each=5))
```
